import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns


# Bland_Altman

[docs]def Bland_Altman(proportions):
    """
    :param proportions: proportions ``data.frame`` of true and proportion estimates from ``CytOpt()``
    """
    proportions['Populations'] = proportions.index.values
    plotData = pd.melt(proportions, id_vars=["Gold_standard", "Populations"],
                       var_name='Method', value_name='Estimate')

    plotData['diff'] = plotData['Estimate'] - plotData['Gold_standard']
    plotData['avg'] = (plotData['Estimate'] - plotData['Gold_standard']) / 2
    plotData['Method'] = plotData['Method'].replace(["minmax", "desasc"],
                                                    ["MinMax swapping", "Descent-Ascent"])

    palettes = ['tab:blue', 'tab:orange', 'tab:green',
                'tab:red', 'tab:purple', 'tab:brown', 'tab:pink',
                'tab:gray', 'tab:olive', 'tab:cyan']

    uniqueValues = set(plotData['Method'])
    fig, axes = plt.subplots(1, len(uniqueValues))
    for idx, item in enumerate(uniqueValues):
        ptlData = plotData[plotData['Method'] == item]
        ax = axes[idx]
        sns.scatterplot(ax=ax, x='avg', y='diff', hue='Populations',
                        s=200, data=ptlData)

        ax.set_xlabel(r'$(p_i + \hat{p}_i)/2$', size=22)
        ax.set_ylabel(r'$(p_i - \hat{p}_i)$', size=22)
        ax.axhline(np.mean(np.std(ptlData['diff'])) + (1.96 * np.std(ptlData['diff'])), xmin=0,
                   linestyle='dashed', label='+1.96 SD')
        ax.axhline(np.mean(np.std(ptlData['diff'])) - (1.96 * np.std(ptlData['diff'])), xmin=0,
                   linestyle='dashed', label='-1.96 SD')
        ax.axhline(np.mean(np.std(ptlData['diff'])), xmin=0, label='Mean')
        ax.set_title(item, size=25)
        ax.get_legend().remove()
        # if idx == len(uniqueValues) - 1:
        #     plt.legend(loc=8)
        # ax.legend(fontsize=17, markerscae=2)
        # ax.legend(loc='upper center', fancybox=True, shadow=True, ncol=5)
    plt.legend(bbox_to_anchor=(1.5, 0), loc='lower right')
    plt.title("Bland-Altman concordance plot", fontweight="bold", loc='left', size=16)
    plt.show()




[docs]def bar_plot(proportions, title=""):
    """
    :param proportions: proportions ``data.frame`` of true and proportion estimates from ``CytOpt()``
    :param title: plot title. Default is ``" "``, i.e. no title.
    """
    proportions['Populations'] = proportions.index.values
    plotData = pd.melt(proportions, id_vars="Populations",
                       var_name='Method', value_name='Proportion')

    plotData['Method'] = plotData['Method'].replace(["minmax", "desasc"],
                                                    ["MinMax swapping", "Descent-Ascent"])
    plt.figure(figsize=(8, 5))
    sns.barplot(x='Populations', y='Proportion', hue='Method', data=plotData,
                palette=['darkgreen', 'lime', 'lightcoral'])
    plt.title('CytOpt estimation and Manual estimation', size=16)
    plt.legend(loc='upper left', fontsize=14)
    plt.xlabel('Population', size=14)
    plt.ylabel('Proportion', size=14)
    plt.ylim(0, 0.8)
    plt.xticks(fontsize=14)
    plt.yticks(fontsize=14)
    plt.title(title, fontweight="bold", loc='left', size=20)
    plt.show()




[docs]def KL_plot(monitoring, n_0=10, n_stop=1000, title="Kullback-Liebler divergence trace"):

    """
    :param monitoring: ``list ``of monitoring estimates from ``CytOpt()`` output.
    :param n_0: first iteration to plot. Default is ``10``.
    :param n_stop: last iteration to plot. Default is ``1000``.
    :param title: plot title. Default is ``Kullback-Liebler divergence trace``.
    :return:
    """
    n_0 = int(n_0)
    n_stop = int(n_stop)

    index = np.arange(n_0, n_stop)

    plotData = {'index': np.tile(index, 2),
                'values': list(monitoring.loc[index, 'minmax']) + list(monitoring.loc[index, 'desasc']),
                'Method': np.repeat(list(monitoring.columns), len(index), axis=0)}

    plotData = pd.DataFrame(data=plotData)

    plotData['Method'] = plotData['Method'].replace(["minmax", "desasc"],
                                                    ["MinMax swapping", "Descent-Ascent"])

    plt.figure(figsize=(12, 7))
    sns.lineplot(data=plotData, x="index", y="values", hue="Method")
    plt.legend(loc='best', fontsize=16)
    plt.xlabel('Iteration', size=20)
    plt.ylabel(r'KL$(\hat{p}|p)$', size=20)
    plt.xticks(size=18)
    plt.yticks(size=18)
    plt.title(title, fontweight="bold", loc='left', size=16)
    plt.show()
